This is a Very Nice 1940’s Gruen that RUNS, SETS & WINDS Nice 10k Gold Filled bezel & Stainless Steel back case. The case is very nice but does have a scratch in a couple areas. (See photos) Case measures 35.5 mm (lug to lug) x 30 mm (Including Crown) Very Nice Two Tone Silver Color Dial is nice with very minor patina. (See photos) It has black lettering, Raised gold hour markers, and Gold hands. Gold Sub second hand is present & working. (See photos) This is a great looking Gruen. (See Photos) Original Crystal looks very nice. Clean 17 Jewel Model 415 movement is running. Nice 1/20 10k Gold Filled stretch band. A VERY NICE 1940’s GRUEN FOR YOUR COLLECTION.
